name: Weekday Warrior
description:
Everyday life can be so boring! Survive the onslaught by keeping up your beat, and add instruments to your song by collecting notes. Don't let the grunts destroy all your instruments, or it's GAME OVER!

  • CONTROLS
    • WASD Keys to move
    • Point, Aim, and Click with your mouse
  • CREDITS
    • Art | _xinmi
    • Music & SFX | guitargasms
    • Programming | Olin Gao
    • Programming | Quang Luong
